challenges.title: User Management Page with Templates
description: The page must match the design as close as possible.
Technology Stack: 1. Use only HTML, CSS, Javascript, Bootstrap, Font Awesome, and Handlebars.
Remember to use the Research-Ask method if you get stuck.
